The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

wikitext.*:
{{book | title=Tolkien Calendar 2003 | image = Tolkien Calendar 2003.jpg | illustrator=[[Ted Nasmith]] | publisher=[[HarperCollins]] | date=[[17 June]] [[2002]] | format=Calendar | pages=32 | noisbn=[[Special:BookSources/0-00-711190-8|0-00-711190-8]] (UK)
[[Special:BookSources/0-06-008656-4|0-06-008656-4]] (US) | precededby=[[Tolkien Calendar 2002]] | followedby=[[Tolkien Calendar 2004]] }} The '''''Tolkien Calendar 2003''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[HarperCollins]] on [[17 June]] [[2002]]. It features art by [[Ted Nasmith]] based on ''[[The Two Towers]]''. ==From the publishers== {{blockquote|The classic Tolkien calendar, this year containing all-new artwork depicting scenes based on the second book of J.R.R. Tolkien’s The Lord of the Rings.

The Tolkien Calendar has become an established publishing event, eagerly looked forward to by Tolkien fans the world over; there is much demand for the annual calendar, with Tolkien calendars from the past 30 years becoming collectors’ items. This year’s continues in that tradition and is the perfect Christmas gift for lovers of fine fantasy art.

The Tolkien Calendar 2003 features 13 brand new paintings from Ted Nasmith, acclaimed Tolkien jacket artist and creator of the illustrated Silmarillion. The paintings are all based on the second volume of Tolkien’s classic masterpiece, The Lord of the Rings, and coincides with the release of the second movie from New Line Cinema, guaranteeing greater popularity than ever before.}} ==Illustrations== * January - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Boromir's Last Stand.jpg|Boromir's Last Stand]]" * February - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Fangorn Forest.jpg|Fangorn Forest]]" * March - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Riders of Rohan.jpg|The Riders of Rohan]]" * April - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Stranger in the Forest.jpg|The Stranger in the Forest]]" * May - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Tree Shepherds.jpg|The Tree Shepherds]]" * June - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Apparitions.jpg|Apparitions]]" * Centrefold - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Wrath of the Ents.jpg|The Wrath of the Ents]]" * July - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - First Sight of Ithilien.jpg|First Sight of Ithilien]]" * August - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Mûmak of Harad.jpg|The Mûmak of Harad]]" * September - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Terrace at Henneth Annûn.jpg|The Terrace at Henneth Annûn]]" * October - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - At the Cross-roads.jpg|At the Cross-Roads]]" * November - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - The Tower of the Moon.jpg|The Tower of the Moon]]" * December - "[[:File:Ted Nasmith - Shelob's Retreat.jpg|Shelob's Retreat]]" ==Variants== File:Tolkien Calendar 2003 (Czech).jpg| '''''Tolkien Kalendár 2003'''''
